title: Editors Choice Pictures
text:
Pictures | Mon Feb 19, 2018 | 8:37am EST Editors Choice Pictures 
Ryoyu Kobayashi of Japan in action during Men's Large Hill Ski Jumping. REUTERS/Kai Pfaffenbach Reuters / Saturday, February 17, 2018 Ryoyu Kobayashi of Japan in action during Men's Large Hill Ski Jumping. REUTERS/Kai Pfaffenbach Close 1 / 24 
Community members console one another at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School four days after the shooting, in Parkland, Florida. REUTERS/Jonathan Drake Reuters / Sunday, February 18, 2018 Community members console one another at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School four days after the shooting, in Parkland, Florida. REUTERS/Jonathan Drake Close 
Vice-skip Sehyeon Seong of South Korea reacts during the Curling Round Robin. REUTERS/Cathal McNaughton Reuters / Sunday, February 18, 2018 Vice-skip Sehyeon Seong of South Korea reacts during the Curling Round Robin. REUTERS/Cathal McNaughton Close 3 / 24 
Folk artists perform a fire dragon dance under a shower of sparks from molten iron during a traditional performance to celebrate Chinese Lunar New Year of the Dog at Happy Valley in Beijing. REUTERS/Jason Lee Reuters / Sunday, February 18, 2018 Folk artists perform a fire dragon dance under a shower of sparks from molten iron during a traditional performance to celebrate Chinese Lunar New Year of the Dog at Happy Valley in Beijing. REUTERS/Jason Lee Close 4 / 24 
Ash from Mount Sinabung volcano rises to an approximate height of 5,000 meters during an eruption as seen from Brastagi town in Karo, North Sumatra, Indonesia. Antara Foto/Tibta Peranginangin/ via REUTERS Reuters / Monday, February 19, 2018 Ash from Mount Sinabung volcano rises to an approximate height of 5,000 meters during an eruption as seen from Brastagi town in Karo, North Sumatra, Indonesia. Antara Foto/Tibta Peranginangin/ via REUTERS Close 5 / 24 
A U.S. Marine drinks the blood of a cobra during a jungle survival exercise as part of the 'Cobra Gold 2018' (CG18) joint military exercise, at a military base in Chonburi province, Thailand. REUTERS/Athit Perawongmetha Reuters / Monday, February 19, 2018 A U.S. Marine drinks the blood of a cobra during a jungle survival exercise as part of the 'Cobra Gold 2018' (CG18) joint military exercise, at a military base in Chonburi province, Thailand. REUTERS/Athit Perawongmetha Close 
Firefighters extinguish a fire at a market in Port-au-Prince, Haiti. REUTERS/Andres Martinez Casares Reuters / Sunday, February 18, 2018 Firefighters extinguish a fire at a market in Port-au-Prince, Haiti. REUTERS/Andres Martinez Casares Close 7 / 24 
NASCAR Cup Series driver Austin Dillon celebrates winning the Daytona 500 at Daytona International Speedway. Jasen Vinlove-USA TODAY Sports Reuters / Sunday, February 18, 2018 NASCAR Cup Series driver Austin Dillon celebrates winning the Daytona 500 at Daytona International Speedway. Jasen Vinlove-USA TODAY Sports Close 8 / 24 
Martin Fourcade of France and Simon Schempp of Germany finish in the Biathlon Men's 15km Mass Start. REUTERS/Toby Melville Reuters / Sunday, February 18, 2018 Martin Fourcade of France and Simon Schempp of Germany finish in the Biathlon Men's 15km Mass Start. REUTERS/Toby Melville Close 9 / 24 
Team LeBron forward LeBron James of the Cleveland Cavaliers celebrates with the trophy for most valuable player after Team LeBron won the 2018 NBA All Star game against Team Stephen. Richard Mackson-USA TODAY Sports Reuters / Sunday, February 18, 2018 Team LeBron forward LeBron James of the Cleveland Cavaliers celebrates with the trophy for most valuable player after Team LeBron won the 2018 NBA All Star game against Team Stephen. Richard Mackson-USA TODAY Sports Close 10 / 24 
Devotees sit at the feet of the monolithic statue of Jain god Gomateshwara as they celebrate the Mahamastakabhisheka, or head anointing ceremony of the statue, in Shravanabelagola, India. REUTERS/Abhishek N. Chinnappa Reuters / Saturday, February 17, 2018 Devotees sit at the feet of the monolithic statue of Jain god Gomateshwara as they celebrate the Mahamastakabhisheka, or head anointing ceremony of the statue, in Shravanabelagola, India. REUTERS/Abhishek N. Chinnappa Close 
Taisei Yamamoto of Japan is filmed by a team-mate during a warm-up. REUTERS/Mike Blake Reuters / Sunday, February 18, 2018 Taisei Yamamoto of Japan is filmed by a team-mate during a warm-up. REUTERS/Mike Blake Close 12 / 24 
Israeli scientists participate in an experiment simulating a mission to Mars, at the D-MARS Desert Mars Analog Ramon Station project of Israel's Space Agency, Ministry of Science, near Mitzpe Ramon, Israel. REUTERS/Ronen Zvulun Reuters / Sunday, February 18, 2018 Israeli scientists participate in an experiment simulating a mission to Mars, at the D-MARS Desert Mars Analog Ramon Station project of Israel's Space Agency, Ministry of Science, near Mitzpe Ramon, Israel. REUTERS/Ronen Zvulun Close 13 / 24 
People react as soldiers stand next to a military helicopter, carrying Mexico's interior minister and the governor of the southern state of Oaxaca, crashed on top of two vans in an open field while trying to land in Santiago Jamiltepec, Mexico.... more Reuters / Saturday, February 17, 2018 People react as soldiers stand next to a military helicopter, carrying Mexico's interior minister and the governor of the southern state of Oaxaca, crashed on top of two vans in an open field while trying to land in Santiago Jamiltepec, Mexico. REUTERS/Jorge Luis Plata Close 14 / 24 
Artist German Vinogradov acts in the performance of the burning of installation, devoted to Maslenitsa, or Pancake Week, a pagan holiday marking the end of winter, in the village of Nikola-Lenivets, Kaluga region, Russia. REUTERS/Maxim Shemetov Reuters / Saturday, February 17, 2018 Artist German Vinogradov acts in the performance of the burning of installation, devoted to Maslenitsa, or Pancake Week, a pagan holiday marking the end of winter, in the village of Nikola-Lenivets, Kaluga region, Russia. REUTERS/Maxim Shemetov Close 15 / 24 
Competitors take part in the 'Riding on Anything' championships organised in Bialka Tatrzanska, Poland. Agencja Gazeta/Marek Podmokly/via REUTERS Reuters / Sunday, February 18, 2018 Competitors take part in the 'Riding on Anything' championships organised in Bialka Tatrzanska, Poland. Agencja Gazeta/Marek Podmokly/via REUTERS Close 16 / 24 
A performer sprays molten iron against a wall to create sparks during a traditional performance to celebrate Chinese Lunar New Year of the Dog in Zhangjiakou, Hebei province, China. REUTERS/Stringer Reuters / Sunday, February 18, 2018 A performer sprays molten iron against a wall to create sparks during a traditional performance to celebrate Chinese Lunar New Year of the Dog in Zhangjiakou, Hebei province, China. REUTERS/Stringer Close 17 / 24 
A man climbs up a wooden pole to get a prize during celebration of Maslenitsa, or Pancake Week, in Belarusian state museum of folk architecture and rural lifestyle near the village Aziarco, Belarus. REUTERS/Vasily Fedosenko Reuters / Saturday, February 17, 2018 A man climbs up a wooden pole to get a prize during celebration of Maslenitsa, or Pancake Week, in Belarusian state museum of folk architecture and rural lifestyle near the village Aziarco, Belarus. REUTERS/Vasily Fedosenko Close 18 / 24 
People watch a cockfighting match, with the highest cash reward of cockfighting in Thai history for more than one million USD, in a stadium on the outskirts of Bangkok, Thailand. REUTERS/Athit Perawongmetha Reuters / Sunday, February 18, 2018 People watch a cockfighting match, with the highest cash reward of cockfighting in Thai history for more than one million USD, in a stadium on the outskirts of Bangkok, Thailand. REUTERS/Athit Perawongmetha Close 
Harry Laidlaw of Australia crashes during the Men's Giant Slalom. REUTERS/Kai Pfaffenbach Reuters / Saturday, February 17, 2018 Harry Laidlaw of Australia crashes during the Men's Giant Slalom. REUTERS/Kai Pfaffenbach Close 20 / 24 
A protester holds a defaced placard at a rally calling for more gun control three days after the shooting at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School, in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. REUTERS/Jonathan Drake Reuters / Saturday, February 17, 2018 A protester holds a defaced placard at a rally calling for more gun control three days after the shooting at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School, in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. REUTERS/Jonathan Drake Close 
Models display creations during the Burberry show at London Fashion Week. REUTERS/Paul Hackett Reuters / Saturday, February 17, 2018 Models display creations during the Burberry show at London Fashion Week. REUTERS/Paul Hackett Close 
Lizzy Yarnold of Britain reacts. REUTERS/Edgar Su Reuters / Saturday, February 17, 2018 Lizzy Yarnold of Britain reacts. REUTERS/Edgar Su Close 
People react after an earthquake shook buildings in Mexico City. REUTERS/Edgard Garrido Reuters / Saturday, February 17, 2018 People react after an earthquake shook buildings in Mexico City. REUTERS/Edgard Garrido Close
